physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 5 x 7 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: On envelope: ''#1029 Trifon's Haberdashery.'' On back of photograph: ''Nat Trifon, Trifon's Haberdashery, #1029.''

mods.abstract: Exterior view of the front of Nat Trifon's Haberdashery with window displays of men's hats. Signage says, ''Trifon's Haberdashery'' and ''A hat for every occasion, Pedigree fine straws $2.45 and up.'' The address on the door is 1553.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
